d:
Quick Links
- Last Viewer Update I know of is December 26th, 2025 (25.0 GB): https://gofile.io/d/lmFwTg
- 2025 gallery: https://e-hentai.org/g/3714929/88818b1407/

MP4 files are embedded into .rar files labeled "lcg_2026_mp4_archive_.png".
- You must download the original png files or else you will not be able to get the original videos.
- Rename the original .png files to .rar files and you can open them as .rar archives with a folder containing mp4 files.
Example in this screenshot https://e-hentai.org/s/e8103157ce/3196530-12

Video Specs:
- Codec AV1 mp4 (crf 30) / 1920x1080 resolution / 60 FPS / 1 second loops

GIFs are provided for one part of each scene. This is meant to give a preview of what is included, not provide gifs for all four scenes. GIF specs are:
- 960x540 resolution / 30 FPS / 1 second loops / approximately 5 MB in size each

With respect to how this gallery is arranged, this is the order for each event:
- character spine
- character scene still
- embedded rar image
- character scene gif (one per scene)

If you only wanted specific events instead of this full gallery, specific event scenes can be retrieved over at the resource thread here:
https://hmvmania.com/forums/topic/live2d-scenes-that-can-be-used-in-hmvs/

Changelog

- 1/20/2026 => lcg_2026_mp4_archive_0 (4 MB, Page 1-8): (1/6) beelzebub
- 1/20/2026 => lcg_2026_mp4_archive_1 (9 MB, Page 9-23): (1/20) shogun
